ApproxsimClient.map.adapter
Interface MapDrawableAdapterListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AreaCreationDrawer, BasicMapDrawer, MapDrawer, SubstrateMapDrawer
public interface MapDrawableAdapterListener
extends EventListener

MapDrawableAdapterListener's listens to changes in MapDrawableAdapters.

Method Summary

          Signaled when an MapDrawableAdapters object is removed.

          Signaled when displaylists in an MapDrawableAdapter needs to be recompiled.
